      </span>
     </h1>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17346615">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17346615">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17346615">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17346615">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17346615" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17346616">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17346616">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17346616">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17346616">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17346616" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17346617">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17346617">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17346617">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works (good for topic-generating and recommending sources)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17346617">
          <div id="boxatt17346617" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20418858">
              <a id="link_20418858" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418858,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available through library subscription. Contains several hundred academic-audience reference works.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20418865">
              Encyclopedia of Clothing and Fashion
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available in print copy in Trexler Library, call # 391.003 E56o, level B.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20418889">
              <a id="link_20418889" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search/?searchtype=t&amp;SORT=D&amp;searcharg=fashion+costume" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418889,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20418889}); ">
               Fashion, Costume, and Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Lengthy entries on fashion grouped by era (1960s, etc.).
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20418894">
              <a id="link_20418894" href="http://library.muhlenberg.edu/search/?searchtype=t&amp;SORT=D&amp;searcharg=st.+james+encyclopedia+of+popular+culture" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418894,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20418894}); ">
               St. James Encyclopedia of Popular Culture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Many entries on fashion, in the context of pop culture.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17346619">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17346619">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17346619">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly books and primary documents
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17346619">
          <p>
           Example histories:
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <em>
             Survey of Historic Costume
             <br />
            </em>
            Trexler Library call # 391.009 T699s, level B
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17346619" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20418833">
              <a id="link_20418833" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418833,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Catalog of books and documents in libraries throughout the world. Watch especially for the AREA LIBRARIES designation.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20418954">
              <a id="link_20418954" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418954,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13011281}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Catalog of books and documents in libraries throughout the world. Watch especially for the AREA LIBRARIES designation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17346730">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17346730">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17346730">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary documents
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17346730">
          <p>
           Also:
           <br />
           Images in any fashion book or article. Images from the web. See especially the book
           <em>
            20th Century Fashion: 100 Years of Apparel Ads
           </em>
           , Trexler Library level B, 659.19687 N666t
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17346730" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20418994">
              <a id="link_20418994" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rgr" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418994,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344565}); ">
               Reader's Guide Retrospective
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20419016">
              <a id="link_20419016" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discoveryoclc/34107580" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20419016,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19275262}); ">
               New York Times Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20419046">
              <a id="link_20419046" href="http://find.galegroup.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/ttda/start.do?userGroupName=mul_coll&amp;finalAuth=true" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20419046,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20419046}); ">
               London Times
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17346779">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17346779">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17346779">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Online books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17346779">
          <div id="boxatt17346779" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20419215">
              <a id="link_20419215" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20419215,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20006208}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An excellent source for full-text of primary documents as they appear in public domain (pre-1923) books and magazines.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17346620">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17346620">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17346620">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly journal articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17346620">
          <div id="boxatt17346620" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20418835">
              <a id="link_20418835" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418835,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               ***RECOMMENDED***
               <br />
               A library subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20418836">
              <a id="link_20418836" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418836,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20418838">
              <a id="link_20418838" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418838,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Standard index for North American history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20418837">
              <a id="link_20418837" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20418837,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456990}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A library subscription database. Standard index for European history. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17346878">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17346878">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17346878">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17345762">
          <div id="boxatt17345762" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20417899">
              <a id="link_20417899" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417899,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20417928">
              <a id="link_20417928" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20417928,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Fashioning Identity', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An open-access web crawler that looks for content it identifies as "scholarly." Emphasis is on books and journal articles. Intended as a "federated search" to search across disciplines (weighted toward sciences and social sciences). Not always full text. Check our Journal Locator (see above) to see if Muhlenberg has access to the full text.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4708139" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17346622">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17346622">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17346622">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources and compiling an annotated bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17346622">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17346622" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17346903">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17346903">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17346903">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Writing a source review
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17346903">
          <p>
           One strategy for writing a source review is to think of it as an amplified annotation, employing the organization described
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/01/">
            here
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17346903" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17346623">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17346623">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17346623">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17346623">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17346623" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
